title: PBE
body:
Hey guys. I have a quick question. I got my PBE confirmation email after 2 or 3 weeks of waiting and it wanted me to create my account. But when I click on the link, it says that my application was received instead of bringing me to the screen to create my account. I don't know if this usually happens or not but, can some one help me out? Any help would be appreciated.

Update: I got a second email that says I need to sign up by November 3 and that my account has been "unlocked", but I am still having no luck with my original problem. {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hiya INYAFACESUKAZ,

There was a bug with the PBE sign up last night. The issue should be resolved. Go ahead and try to create your account. If you're still having issues, please let me know!
